nodes.name: Lonnie King Jr.
nodes.quote: We've got to do this here

nodes.name: MLK Jr.
nodes.quote: I do not feel we did anything wrong in going to Rich’s today and seeking to be served. We went there peacefully, non-violently, and in the spirit of love

nodes.name: Julian Bond
nodes.quote: He was a hometown boy.. so it was hard for us to look at him as Martin Luther King, Jr. It was hard for us to revere him, I think, the way other people did.

nodes.name: Rufus Clement
nodes.quote: We are not going to tell you what you can or can't do but let us give you some advice. Before you take action, picketing or demonstrating, you should draw up a bill of particulars as to what your grievances are. If you do a good job, we will see that it gets printed in the local newspapers.

nodes.name: John Lewis
nodes.quote: “[W]e were all about” a “mass movement, an irre-sistible  movement of the masses. Not a handful of lawyers in a closed court-room, but hundreds, thousands of everyday people ..taking their cause and belief to the streets. -John Lewis”

nodes.name: Carolyn Long Banks
nodes.quote: I [am] one of the many persons he arrested. It was Chief Jenkins who protected us—who made sure that even though we were determined to be arrested, that we were going to be arrested kindly and gently.

nodes.name: Ivan Allen Jr.
nodes.quote: We won't let this happen here

nodes.name: William Hartsfield
nodes.quote: We are a city too busy to hate. Atlanta does not cling to the past. People who swear on the old Southern traditions don't know what the hell they are.

nodes.name: Calvin L. Craig
nodes.quote: We are for the Christian-Protestant religion, the U.S. Government and Constitution thereof and , of course, White Supremacy

nodes.name: Ernest Vandiver
nodes.quote: Wherever M.L.King, Jr., has been there has followed in his wake a wave of crimes including stabbing, bombings, and inciting of riots, barratry, destruction of propoerty and many others.For these reasons, he is not welcome to Georgia.

nodes.name: Lester Maddox
nodes.quote: Most people feel as we do, but they're just not organized.

nodes.name: Richard H. Rich
nodes.quote: I didn't care if another Negro EVER comes into my store
